Html:
Ok so I am not the most computer savey person on the planet but im pretty certain I can follow directions.

Can anyone help me with how to get this program to work, I have tried downloading the 2.0 Framework a few times and then proceeded to completely uninstall the framework and the reinstall using the direct link from the rawr readme file. I even proceeded to do all my windows system updates and attempted to repair the framework a seperate time also to no avail. At one point after unitnstalling and reinstalling i even went and removed the old versions of the frame work per the directions given on a microsoft support site and still I get the following when I try and start rawr.....

Rawr has encountered a problem and needs to close.  We are sorry for the inconvenience. and then follows to ask me if i want to send the error report to microsoft

Rawr experts please help.

Thanks in advance for all the possible help.
Gunna have to post the full error text for us to be able to help.

I hope this is what you are reffering to it's titles error signature

EventType : clr20r3     P1 : rawr.exe     P2 : 1.14.1.0     P3 : 482c1021    
P4 : rawr     P5 : 1.14.1.0     P6 : 482c1021     P7 : 1b5     P8 : 3e    
P9 : system.io.filenotfoundexception
Not exactly, but that gives a hint... You need to unzip the entire Rawr.zip somewhere where you have full access, such as My Documents.
